name: Jikoronpa: Laments of Isolation (Chapter 1 + Prologue)
description:
"Nobody can be a person without other people, that's what I've always known."

In this Danganronpa fangame, Hikari and 13 other guests are in the Reflection System, a system where they are meant to face certain "truths" of themselves through poetry and communication. However, it seems like that system may not last long...

Jikoronpa: Laments of Isolation is a fangame for the series Danganronpa from Spike Chunsoft. It has no official relations to it and is completely non-profit. This game may contain sensitive topics or implied mentions of topics such as abuse or suicide. There will also be depictions of gore as well. If you may feel uncomfortable with these things, please exercise caution before playing.
